p: Animal studies were approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of Yonsei University (IACUC-A-201904-883-01). ApoE −/− mice were provided by Dr. Goo Taeg Oh, Ewha Womans University. They were housed under a 12-h day-night cycle with free access to water and food in a specific-pathogen-free system. The mice were fed a high cholesterol diet from 6 weeks of age to the end of the experiment.
